name: researcher-ai
title: Researcher AI
description: Leverages Raycast AI to generate detailed research reports through an agentic process. Takes roughly 20 AI requests to generate a report.
author: matthew_su

commands.name: researcher-ai
commands.title: Researcher AI
commands.description: Go to Researcher AI dashboard to manage your research projects.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
